articles.author: Adam Schreck and Cara Anna
articles.title: Ukraine's Zelenskyy: Russian aggression targets Europe - CTV News
articles.description: Russia is targeting all of Europe with its invasion of Ukraine, and stopping Moscow's aggression is essential for the security of all democracies, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said as Russian forces prepared for battle in the east of his country.
articles.content:

articles.title: EU officials say it's too early to consider 4th COVID dose - Chattanooga Times Free Press
articles.description: European health officials say it's too early to consider giving a fourth dose of messenger RNA coronavirus vaccines to most people, but say an extra booster can be administered to those over age 80.

articles.title: Voter turnout drops to 25 percent in first round of French presidential election - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: President Macron’s camp is worried that high abstention rates could be used to question his legitimacy if he ultimately wins a second term.
articles.content:
Voter turnout is so far lower than in previous years as France heads to the polls Sunday in the first round of its presidential election.

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Google joins Samsung in working with iFixit on a self-repair program - The Verge
articles.description: Google has partnered with DIY repair specialists iFixit to offer spare parts for its devices. Pixel smartphone parts like batteries, displays, and cameras, will be available to purchase in the US, Canada, Australia, the UK, and Europe.
articles.content:
